name: v1.0.0
body:
WORKSPACE snippet:
```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_rollup",
    sha256 = "a0433a0b0206a45d362749d71bc1e4e0dacf5ca2a572b059328f9753392bca80",
    strip_prefix = "rules_rollup-1.0.0",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_rollup/releases/download/v1.0.0/rules_rollup-v1.0.0.tar.gz",
)


######################
# rules_rollup setup #
######################
load("@aspect_rules_rollup//rollup:dependencies.bzl", "rules_rollup_dependencies")

# Fetches the rules_rollup dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.
# Alternatively, you can skip calling this function, so long as you've
# already fetched all the dependencies.
rules_rollup_dependencies()

# Fetch and register a node toolchain, if you haven't already
load("@rules_nodejs//nodejs:repositories.bzl", "DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION", "nodejs_register_toolchains")

nodejs_register_toolchains(
    name = "node",
    node_version = DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION,
)

load("@aspect_rules_js//npm:npm_import.bzl", "npm_translate_lock")

npm_translate_lock(
    name = "npm",
    pnpm_lock = "@aspect_rules_rollup//:pnpm-lock.yaml",
)

load("@npm//:repositories.bzl", "npm_repositories")

npm_repositories()
```


## What's Changed
* Fix the link to the API documentation by @chrismgrayftsinc in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_rollup/pull/85

## New Contributors
* @chrismgrayftsinc made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_rollup/pull/85

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_rollup/compare/v0.15.2...v1.0.0

## What's Changed
* chore: update dependencies by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_rollup/pull/78
* test: run rollup/tests:bundle as a build_test by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_rollup/pull/81

* chore: bzlmod by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_rollup/pull/72


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_rollup/compare/v0.14.0...v0.15.0

name: v0.14.0
body:
⚠️ BREAKING CHANGES ⚠️

The `rollup_bundle` rule is renamed to just `rollup`. This has been planned for a while to do before 1.0 and included in this release to go along with other breaking changes. `rollup_repositories` repository rule is removed and a new `node_modules` attribute is now required for `rollup`. This changes are BREAKING for all users.

The `//path/to:node_modules` tree target must be passed to the `rollup` rule via the `node_modules` attribute. For example,

```
rollup(
    name = "bundle",
    node_modules = "//:node_modules",
    ...
)
```

You'll need `rollup` linked in the node_modules tree provided.

This change has the added benefits of not requiring users to keep the terser version used in their `package.json` in sync with their WORKSPACE and not requiring any changes to `rules_rollup` to support new releases of rollup.

This change is in the spirit of the changes in rules_webpack [v0.11.0](https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/releases/tag/v0.11.0), rules_jasmine [v0.4.0](https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/releases) and rules_terser [v0.14.0](https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_terser/releases/tag/v0.14.0) and will also be rolled out to rules_jest in the near future so the patterns on the downstream rules_js rulesets we maintain are aligned both for maintainers and for users.

## WORKSPACE snippet

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_rollup",
    sha256 = "3777f196b7ced25241a6ccdc41551de6bd0817630cce1924919b9e9816676e43",
    strip_prefix = "rules_rollup-0.14.0",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_rollup/releases/download/v0.14.0/rules_rollup-v0.14.0.tar.gz",
)


######################
# rules_rollup setup #
######################
load("@aspect_rules_rollup//rollup:dependencies.bzl", "rules_rollup_dependencies")

# Fetches the rules_rollup dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.
# Alternatively, you can skip calling this function, so long as you've
# already fetched all the dependencies.
rules_rollup_dependencies()

# Fetch and register a node toolchain, if you haven't already
load("@rules_nodejs//nodejs:repositories.bzl", "DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION", "nodejs_register_toolchains")

nodejs_register_toolchains(
    name = "node",
    node_version = DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION,
)

load("@aspect_rules_js//npm:npm_import.bzl", "npm_translate_lock")

npm_translate_lock(
    name = "npm",
    npmrc = "//:.npmrc",
    pnpm_lock = "//:pnpm-lock.yaml",
    verify_node_modules_ignored = "//:.bazelignore",
)

load("@npm//:repositories.bzl", "npm_repositories")

npm_repositories()
```


## What's Changed
* chore: update to aspect_bazel_lib 1.27.2 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_rollup/pull/73
* chore: update to Aspect CLI 5.2.0-rc0 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_rollup/pull/74
* chore: update to Aspect CLI 5.2.1 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_rollup/pull/75
* chore: update transitive deps by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_rollup/pull/76
* refactor: remove vendored rollup versions, user must provider their own rollup from their node_modules by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_rollup/pull/77


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_rollup/compare/v0.13.1...v0.14.0

name: v0.13.1
body:
WORKSPACE snippet:
```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_rollup",
    sha256 = "4c43d20ce377b93cd43a3553e6159a17b85ce80c36a564b55051c2320d32b777",
    strip_prefix = "rules_rollup-0.13.1",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_rollup/releases/download/v0.13.1/rules_rollup-v0.13.1.tar.gz",
)


######################
# rules_rollup setup #
######################
load("@aspect_rules_rollup//rollup:dependencies.bzl", "rules_rollup_dependencies")

# Fetches the rules_rollup dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.
# Alternatively, you can skip calling this function, so long as you've
# already fetched all the dependencies.
rules_rollup_dependencies()

load("@aspect_rules_rollup//rollup:repositories.bzl", "rollup_repositories")

rollup_repositories(name = "rollup")

load("@rollup//:npm_repositories.bzl", rollup_npm_repositories = "npm_repositories")

rollup_npm_repositories()

# Fetch and register a node toolchain, if you haven't already
load("@rules_nodejs//nodejs:repositories.bzl", "DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION", "nodejs_register_toolchains")

nodejs_register_toolchains(
    name = "node",
    node_version = DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION,
)
```


## What's Changed
* chore: Add the macOS runner to the matrix strategy by @realtimetodie in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_rollup/pull/65
* chore: update to rules_js 1.19.0 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_rollup/pull/69
* release: publish release artifact by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_rollup/pull/68
* Adding rollup 3.15.0 version by @vsrikrishna32 in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_rollup/pull/71

## New Contributors
* @realtimetodie made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_rollup/pull/65
* @vsrikrishna32 made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_rollup/pull/71

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_rollup/compare/v0.13.0...v0.13.1

name: v0.12.1
body:
WORKSPACE snippet:
```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_rollup",
    sha256 = "bca82203e3bbcf1202011b25fc8e369fc2ed641a60e293500d64884a18a77b6f",
    strip_prefix = "rules_rollup-0.12.1",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_rollup/archive/refs/tags/v0.12.1.tar.gz",
)


######################

######################

# Fetches the rules_rollup dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,

# Alternatively, you can skip calling this function, so long as you've

load("@aspect_rules_rollup//rollup:repositories.bzl", "rollup_repositories")

# Fetch and register a node toolchain, if you haven't already

nodejs_register_toolchains(

)
```


## What's Changed
* chore: update to aspect_bazel_lib 1.16.0 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_rollup/pull/49
* chore: update to Bazel 6.0.0rc1 and test against both 6.0.0rc1 and 5.3.2 on CI by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_rollup/pull/50
* chore: update to rules_js 1.6.6 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_rollup/pull/52


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_rollup/compare/v0.12.0...v0.12.1

name: v0.12.0
body:
WORKSPACE snippet:
```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_rollup",
    sha256 = "5157c45170c3e0b6b5ac465b8af371ee0ad0b4e9ee8124ec648302188ac57d6f",
    strip_prefix = "rules_rollup-0.12.0",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_rollup/archive/refs/tags/v0.12.0.tar.gz",
)


######################
# rules_rollup setup #
######################
load("@aspect_rules_rollup//rollup:dependencies.bzl", "rules_rollup_dependencies")

# Fetches the rules_rollup dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.
# Alternatively, you can skip calling this function, so long as you've
# already fetched all the dependencies.
rules_rollup_dependencies()

load("@aspect_rules_rollup//rollup:repositories.bzl", "rollup_repositories")

rollup_repositories(name = "rollup")

load("@rollup//:npm_repositories.bzl", rollup_npm_repositories = "npm_repositories")

rollup_npm_repositories()

# Fetch and register a node toolchain, if you haven't already
load("@rules_nodejs//nodejs:repositories.bzl", "DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION", "nodejs_register_toolchains")

nodejs_register_toolchains(
    name = "node",
    node_version = DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION,
)
```


## What's Changed
* chore: update to rules_js 1.1.2 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_rollup/pull/37

* chore(deps): update dependency rules_nodejs to v5.6.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_rollup/pull/45

name: v0.11.0
body:
WORKSPACE snippet:
```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_rollup",
    sha256 = "0554230e8323ec0e81d62c4fad0aea88c1b80c91483dfa76bdf71f0ad8a8fb53",
    strip_prefix = "rules_rollup-0.11.0",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_rollup/archive/refs/tags/v0.11.0.tar.gz",
)


######################
# rules_rollup setup #
######################
load("@aspect_rules_rollup//rollup:dependencies.bzl", "rules_rollup_dependencies")

# Fetches the rules_rollup dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.
# Alternatively, you can skip calling this function, so long as you've
# already fetched all the dependencies.
rules_rollup_dependencies()

load("@aspect_rules_rollup//rollup:repositories.bzl", "LATEST_VERSION", "rollup_register_toolchains")

rollup_register_toolchains(
    name = "rollup",
    rollup_version = LATEST_VERSION,
)

# Fetch and register a node toolchain, if you haven't already
load("@rules_nodejs//nodejs:repositories.bzl", "DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION", "nodejs_register_toolchains")

nodejs_register_toolchains(
    name = "node",
    node_version = DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION,
)
```

[rules_js 1.1.0](https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/releases/tag/v1.1.0) is required for this release.

## What's Changed
* fix: use unique npm_import namespace for vendored npm dependencies of rules_rollup by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_rollup/pull/27
* chore(deps): update dependency io_bazel_rules_go to v0.34.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_rollup/pull/33
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel_skylib to v1.2.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_rollup/pull/32
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel_gazelle to v0.26.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_rollup/pull/31
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_nodejs to v5.5.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_rollup/pull/30
* chore(deps): update dependency io_bazel_stardoc to v0.5.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_rollup/pull/29
* chore: update to rules_js 1.0.0 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_rollup/pull/34
* chore: update to rules_js 1.1.0 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_rollup/pull/35


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_rollup/compare/v0.10.0...v0.11.0

## What's Changed
* fix: use short_path when resolving files in bazel-out by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_rollup/pull/10
* fix: rename rollup_bundle.bzl to defs.bzl by @thesayyn in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_rollup/pull/11
* fix: default for rollup config pointed to non-existent target by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_rollup/pull/12
* chore: update to rules_js 0.13.0 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_rollup/pull/14
* Configure Renovate by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_rollup/pull/15
* chore(deps): update actions/cache action to v3 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_rollup/pull/17
* chore(deps): update actions/checkout action to v3 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_rollup/pull/18
